Author: n0kikin0ki
Text: try upping your calories more. it doesn't have to be a whole lot but i've lost weight pretty steadily on >!1,200 calories!< and my hair only fell out a little bit. i've upped again and have been burning extra off through exercise so i'm still at a >!1,200 total!< and now my hair has stopped falling out. it's still disordered but your body will function better.
